title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After another wild week in the NFL, Colin points out that a chaotic AFC is starting to show us who the great teams actually are. He discusses the Packers shutout win over the Seahawks with Aaron Rodgers and Russell Wilson both making their return and what this tells us about the state of the Seattle organization. He also tells you why he was right about Baker Mayfield and wrong about the Buccaneers. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl champion and Fox Sports NFL analyst Jimmy Johnson joins the show to talk about the Cowboys big bounce back win and the Chiefs offense getting back on track.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
